TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . He is represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , PERSON , PERSON and PERSON PERSON , lawyers practising in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) did not designate an Agent for the purposes of the proceedings before the ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

On DATE at TIME a group of police officers from the Anti - Terrorism Branch of ORG surrounded the applicant ’s house in PERSON . The applicant alleges that the police officers entered the house , carried out a search and asked the applicant ’s daughter , PERSON , to show them the cellar which was in the basement of the house . PERSON resisted going down with them ; however the officers forced her to . The applicant then heard the police officers ask PERSON whether there were any ORG terrorists in the house . When PERSON replied that there was no one else in the house , she was beaten and insulted . After TIME , the applicant heard gun shots . The firing continued for TIME . When the firing stopped , the applicant and the other family members were taken out and they saw that PERSON , who was badly wounded , was lying in the street . The applicant tried to help his daughter , but the police officers prevented him by pointing a gun at his head . No medical assistance was requested and PERSON was left in the street for a long time . The police officers told PERSON that they would only take her to the hospital if she accepted that there were other terrorists in the house . After some time , PERSON was taken to ORG , where she died .

On DATE , a classical autopsy was performed on PERSON ’s body at ORG in the presence of the PERSON public prosecutor . The report indicates that a bullet which had entered the body from the left of the chest damaged the spleen , stomach , and the left part of the liver , and the cause of death was internal bleeding .

On DATE , the police officers drew up an incident and arrest report . In the report , it was stated that , upon receipt of intelligence that armed ORG terrorists had been hiding in the applicant ’s house , an operation was conducted to arrest the terrorists . The incident report states that , upon arrival at the scene at TIME , the house was surrounded by the security forces . At that time , CARDINAL persons tried to leave the house by the back door . The security forces ordered them to surrender but CARDINAL of the terrorists threw a hand grenade towards the officers . The officers then fired warning shots into the air and the terrorists responded with gun shots . A clash broke out , during which CARDINAL terrorists died and CARDINAL of them was wounded . CARDINAL police officers were also wounded during the clash . The wounded terrorist ( PERSON ) was taken to ORG . The police then secured the area and conducted a search . They found CARDINAL hand grenades and a PERSON pistol on the first terrorist , ORG , and CARDINAL hand grenades and an Astra model gun on the second terrorist , S.R , a NORP national . They also found another hand grenade which was ready to explode near the CARDINAL bodies . PERSON ( the applicant ) , PERSON and PERSON were taken into custody for aiding and abetting the ORG .

Also on DATE , FAC issued a public statement and announced that , in the course of an operation conducted against the ORG , CARDINAL terrorists had been killed and QUANTITY police officers had been wounded .

On DATE ORG delivered a ballistics report . It established that there were gunpowder traces on the hands of ORG and ORG No evidence of any gunpowder residue was found on PERSON ’s hands . The ballistics report further confirmed the existence of an explosive material in the earth sample which had been brought for analysis from the scene of the incident where the hand grenade had exploded .
For the purpose of the proceedings before the domestic courts , the applicant instructed CARDINAL lawyers who worked at the same law office , namely PERSON and Mr PERSON .

On DATE the applicant ’s representatives lodged a petition with the PERSON public prosecutor , stating that the applicant ’s daughter had been unlawfully killed by the police . Maintaining that PERSON was not connected to any illegal organisation , they requested the prosecutor to conduct an investigation into her death .

On DATE , pursuant to Law No . DATE on the prosecution of civil servants , the PERSON prosecutor sent the file to ORG office to obtain authorisation to initiate criminal proceedings against the CARDINAL police officers who had been involved in the operation .

On DATE the Governor appointed a police officer as rapporteur to investigate the allegations . On DATE , basing himself on the rapporteur ’s report , the Governor decided that there was no need to prosecute the accused police officers .
This decision was challenged before ORG . However , the challenge was rejected .
On DATE , referring to the decision of ORG , the PERSON public prosecutor delivered a decision of non - prosecution in respect of the police officers .
On DATE the applicant ’s representatives appealed .
On DATE ORG rejected the applicant ’s appeal . This decision was notified to PERSON on DATE and to Mr PERSON on DATE .
